original_title: Big Wheels: A Tale of the Laundry Game
overview: Originally a short story from the writer Stephen King, Big Wheels: A Tale of the Laundry Game is a short adaptation written by Devin Garbedian as part of the Dollar Babies Program. Two men looking for a lastminute vehicle inspection, reunite with an old high school "buddy" at his garage. Only they weren't buddies in high school at all- Brutal Bobby will tell you.
title: Big Wheels: A Tale of the Laundry Game
